amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 116-61 to prohibit the Secretary of HHS from ending autoenrollment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Welch.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
